Description: Lentils: High in protein and fiber; great for heart health.
Chickpeas: Versatile and rich in protein and fiber.
Edamame: Young soybeans, rich in protein and essential nutrients.
Black beans: Protein-rich and high in fiber for digestion.
Kidney beans: High in protein and fiber, excellent in stews.
Soy milk: High in protein and often fortified with vitamins.
Greek yogurt: High in protein and probiotics (not vegan).
Quinoa: Complete protein with all nine essential amino acids.
Buckwheat: High in protein and essential nutrients.
Chia seeds: High in protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and fiber.
Hemp seeds: Complete protein source with healthy fats.
Pumpkin seeds: Rich in protein and various minerals.
Flaxseeds: Provides protein along with omega-3 fatty acids.
Tofu: Versatile protein source made from soybeans.
Tempeh: Fermented soybeans, high in protein and probiotics.
Cottage cheese: High in casein protein, slow-digesting (not vegan).
